thread.title: Watch List for Oct. 8
thread.title_full: Watch List for Oct. 8 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Watch List for Oct. 8
text:
LIVE EVENTS
NHL
• Ottawa at Buffalo, 7 p.m., First Niagara Center.
ON TELEVISION
Auto Racing
• Sprint Cup Bank of America 500 Qualifying, 1:30 p.m., NBCSN.
• Xfinity Drive for the Cure 300 Practice, 3 p.m., NBCSN.
• Xfinity Drive for the Cure 300 Final Practice, 5:30 p.m., NBCSN.
• Sprint Cup Bank of America 500 Qualifying, 7 p.m., NBCSN.
College Football
• S.C. State at Bethune-Cookman, 7:30 p.m., ESPNU.
• SMU at Houston, 8 p.m., ESPN2.
• Washington at USC, 9 p.m., ESPN.
Golf
• LPGA Tour, Sime Darby Malaysia, noon, Golf.
• PGA Tour, Presidents Cup, 2 p.m., 8:30 p.m., Golf.
MLB
• ALDS Game 1: Texas at Toronto, 3:30 p.m., FS1.
• ALDS Game 1: Houston at Kansas City, 7:30 p.m., FS1.
NFL
• Indianapolis at Houston, 8:25 p.m., CBS, NFLN.
NHL
• Ottawa at Buffalo, 7 p.m., MSG.
• Minnesota at Colorado, 9 p.m., NBCSN.
Women’s College Volleyball
• BYU at Pacific, 11 p.m., ESPNU.
ON RADIO
MLB
• ALDS Game 1: Texas at Toronto, 3:30 p.m., 1520.
• ALDS Game 1: Houston at Kansas City, 7:30 p.m., 1520.
NHL
• Ottawa at Buffalo, 7 p.m., 550.
